website_summaries.verdict: This synthetic chair is a great replacement for older wooden Adirondacks used outdoors year-round. Recycled material actually heavier and sturdier than real wood.
pros: Available in a number of bold colors
Heavy duty polymer resists sun damage and warping
Oversized arms and slats for comfort
cons: Assembly a challenging, two person operation
Back is not angled comfortably, some users report

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these (in different colors). They have been sitting out, unprotected, in the hot Florida sun for nearly two years and they still look as good as the day I got them. Plus they're sturdy and comfortable. But, the best thing I love about these chairs is that they're made from recycled material! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa (H)

customer_reviews.title: No more painting!
customer_reviews.text: After years of painting our wooden adirondack chairs we finally put them to the curb for the dumpster divers! We ordered two of these. We liked them so much we ordered two more. The neighbors are envious and now say they are going to get some like ours! We ordered the teal but I would call them turquoise which is my favorite color. A wonderful feature is that they fold away for winter. These are heavy!
customer_reviews.author: auntie em

customer_reviews.title: Best composite chairs
customer_reviews.text: The very best composite, wood subsitute chairs you can buy if you are looking for Adirondack. Why even buy wood chairs? You'll be painting them all the time and they will look worn like crap. GO WITH THE DELUXE 7-SLAT VERSION. So nice! It looks the best and is the most comfortable. Set up was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Expected Chairs to Be More Comfortable Considering the Premium Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought three chairs (one each yellow, weathered wood and island teal). All chairs are nice looking, sturdy and were easy to assemble. They all seem to be built well with respect to materials and workmanship. That said, for the price I'd really expected a better, much more comfortable sitting experience. I have to agree with an earlier reviewer who wrote the chair's back should have been designed with a slightly greater angle to keep you from having to sit so straight up.
customer_reviews.author: Caveat emptor

customer_reviews.title: No lock nuts in bag. How complicated is this ...
customer_reviews.text: No lock nuts in bag for chair #1. No holes drilled for arms on chair 2. How complicated is this? Black marks in various spots on both chair from construction. I have purchased these chairs before. No previous problems but quality control has clearly gone south.
customer_reviews.author: Super Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great chair.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality chair. It is not as comfortable as my previous wooden ones ( I think it's the seating angle ) but it should last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to final assemble and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are very comfortable and came more assembled than I expected. They replace older wood versions in our back yard and the splash of color is also a plus. We shopped around and similar chairs were almost double the price. Funny the kids got mad we did not get ones for them so likely to get two more in different colors to round out the backyard!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something substantial enough to last but easier to store. I did a lot of research, I looked at Highwood, Polywood, Trex and a few other and chose these. I liked the fact they sit low like a traditional Adirondack style and had the curved back and seat. They also fold which will make them easier to store out of season. They are a nice weight so probably won't blow around but are easy enough for one person to move. The arms are wide enough to hold a drink or a small plate without and additional table.
customer_reviews.author: RipleyMD

customer_reviews.title: Great chair. worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this chair. Much more comfortable than the Adirondack chairs that I have owned in the past. Love the color. I just sink into my chair and relaxxxx xx
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Our new summer furniture for the lake
customer_reviews.text: these chairs are the hit of our lake. Bright and cheerful. Horrible to put together but we did it. Once assembled, they are a nice chair and we saved a lot by purchasing them online. They are real heavy so will not blow off our pier. I highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Penny Benson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chairs!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these chairs to use around our pool and fire pit in our backyard. They are the perfect height for the fire pit, and very easy to maintain. Just spray them off and you're done. We're in a pretty windy location, so for us their weight is a plus. They're on the heavy side, but very sturdy and very comfortable. They fold easily for storing. The colors are bright and vibrant, which add a pop of color around the pool. We're extremely happy with them and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TxYellowRose

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty folding Adirondack chair
customer_reviews.text: As they always say.......you get what you pay for. These chairs are well made and won't blow off your patio in a typical spring wind storm. They are comfortable and since they fold up they store a lot easier during the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh A. Persson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! We purchased 2 red chairs, 2 yellow chairs, 1 red folding table and 1 yellow folding table for our dock and they look great. Very vibrant color and we get commented on how great they look. Pretty solid and heavy so we don't have to worry about them blowing in the water when it's windy. Highly recommended 😊
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Summer Comfort
customer_reviews.text: The chair was really easy to assemble. It is made extremely well and is surprisingly comfortable. I bought it because it folds up for easy storage and is weather resistant. I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry St Pierre

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT. VERY IMPRESSED
customer_reviews.text: 4 SCREWS AND DONE. HAVE THE HOLE SET. LOVE IT. VERY IMPRESSED.
customer_reviews.author: SPFOSTER

customer_reviews.title: My vacation chair
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy and comfortable to sit back and relax. The color makes me think of the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. This chair should last forever. I'll be looking at more PHAT TOMMY products. The red is very bright and my husband loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Connie C. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: easy to maintain
customer_reviews.text: Second chair purchased. Well built, easy to maintain, just wipe off.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kreger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super in all ways, pretty blue color, heavy and sturdy, top quality,comfy: Tops
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Paxton

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable chairs, heavy and do not get blown around
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs, have them overlooking the river, wind does not effect them, very comfortable to sit in, recommend buying the ottoman
customer_reviews.author: mtnkd

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and great value
customer_reviews.text: Just bought 4 chairs for fire pit--once assembled one, the other 3 were easy. Did not even look at instructions. Color is deep black and fits very well. Comfortable too. Heavy so it will not move during strong wind. Wish there is a matching table. Like the round end front of chair, many other chairs do not have this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Carylle Severnak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast and quality made. First chair took about 20 minutes to assemble. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Donald Curdie

customer_reviews.title: Love this Adirondack chair!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, light enough I can fold and put it away when we need more yard space. Have had two for 4 years outside- Texas sun and all. Washes clean- no fadingz
customer_reviews.author: Stkj

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, nice looking, good size, sturdy and easy to assemble. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: George C.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I little too heavy - makes it hard to move them. But sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bowes

customer_reviews.title: Great to look at and sit in, but a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these chairs; both are beautiful and fold nicely. However, they're a lot heavier than I expected, which means I can't use them the way I'd planned. (I bought them to take on RV/camping trips, but instead they're living in my backyard.) The upside to this, though, is that they're sturdy, so they seem like they'll last forever -- and I do love how they look in my yard!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING COMFORT
customer_reviews.text: Ok - we'll start with the bad new... no one wants to leave when we sit around the fire pit at night.... these chairs are so comfortable - perfect proportions... and the arms are perfect for resting a wine glass!! Assembly was quite easy....
customer_reviews.author: Coral

customer_reviews.title: Worst engineering ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst engineering ever. Actually it looks like a pretty durable product now that it's together. But getting to this point was a nightmare. There are only four pieces to assemble (six bolts). Should have been a piece of cake. But ended up taking two days. The first step was bolting the legs to the frame. Easy, right? Except the pre-drilled holes have no tolerance and must be exactly aligned. And a (mounted) fascia bracket prevents them from aligning. I had to file away 1/4" to 1/2" of material to make them fit. And then had to do it by feel, not by eye. I'll never buy another product from this manufacturer again.
customer_reviews.author: kwilding

customer_reviews.title: Kicking back at the Pit II
customer_reviews.text: Perfect chair for sitting and enjoying our fire pit at the lake. Super comfortable to lay back, relax, enjoy and still easy to get up and out of. We bought 3 of these chairs to accent our brown Highwood Adirondacks which we also love!.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Crosby

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THESE CHAIRS FROM BUYER'S CHOICE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought what I thought were Fire Engine Red Adirondack chairs from BUYER'S CHOICE. They were NEON Red/Orange, not the color Buyer's Choice advertised! FALSE ADVERTISING! To prove my point, I took a picture of a fire truck with their chair.....the chair is ORANGE next to the fire engine red truck! They were cheaply made, heavy and ugly! Amazon was amazing in the nightmarish process to return them. Thank you for your customer service, Amazon. I can not say that about Buyer's Choice. The owner was unprofessional and juvenile. Don't buy anything from Buyer's Choice. They won't work with you and you'll be stuck with a nightmare to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Anne R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Sturdy. Easy to Assemble.
customer_reviews.text: One of the better poly-wood chairs. Sturdy. Relatively maintenance-free. Does not fade in the sun. Folds up. Made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Frumious

customer_reviews.title: Like a guilotine!
customer_reviews.text: The chair is great and comfortable, the material is maintenance free, but the design of this folding chair almost makes it a guilotine! You really have to watch your fingers to keep from getting them chopped off when handling this thing. Also, it doesn't stand up against a wall when folded either. It seems almost as if laying these chairs down on the floor is the best way (I expected they would lean against the wall, but they don't do it well). Otherwise, it would be a great chair.
customer_reviews.author: A. Horsacourse

customer_reviews.title: Adirondack Chair by Phat  Tommy- 6 or 7 slats
customer_reviews.text: Standard Phat Tommy chair is a 6 slat chair. There is a 7 slat chair (405 model) that is a little wider and much more comfortable. Quality is great on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kid Leo

product_meta.title: Phat Tommy Recycled Poly Resin Folding Adirondack Chair – Durable and Eco-Friendly Armchair. This Patio Furniture is Great for Your Lawn, Garden, Swimming Pool, Deck.
product_meta.description: Color:WEATHERPhat Tommy Recycled Poly Resin Folding Adirondack Chair Another enviromental Friendly Quality “Made in the USA” Product from Phat Tommy Outdoors RELAXING AND COMFORTABLE – seat and back are contoured STYLISH APPEARANCE – comes in 14 colors WORRY FREE – low maintenance LONG LASTING – quality material and made in the USA From Phat Tommy: -We look in all corners of the World for quality products at the lowest possible prices. -Create Your Outdoor Oasis with PHAT TOMMY home and garden products
feature_bullets: ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY - made of thick recycled poly material and strong
COMFORTABLE & STRONG - chair back and seat contoured for relaxing; chair capacity 450 pounds
MADE IN USA/10 YEAR WARRANTY – superior craftsmanship. we stand behind our products
DIMENSIONS Each Chair: 30"L x 35"W x 37"H 43 lbs. Seat: 22"W x 18" D and 12” from ground

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars46 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
